description: Lojack SafetyNet provides personal locator bracelets for persons at risk of wandering or becoming lost. The bracelets can be worn 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, are waterproof and are for persons of any age. The bracelet operates on frequencies allowing quick communication to law enforcement of a lost individual and the search will begin to find them.
name: LOJACK SAFETYNET
